Articles.Content: So for my channel should I contue project explore where all the kerbels explore the whole solar system or evacuate because a astriod is going to wipe out kerbin they have to leave it.

So should I contue my ksp series project explore where I explore the whole solar system or a new one called projectkerbinleave where astriod will hit kerbin get they have to eavatue as many kerbels as possible to stay safe?

Also why does it say I'm a newbie I've played ksp for 3 years?
I have no idea what your series is, but perhaps you could launch multiple missions. One is trying to find habitable spots in the solar system, the other is attempting to redirect the asteroid?

Because you just joined the forums

Also, why did you make two threads asking the same question?

Edited January 27, 2016 by Choctofliatrio2.0
I made a second one because the first one didn't have my notification on and I want to know what people say.
Merged duplicate threads and moved over to the right forum for discussion of streams and channels.
links to the channel(s) might help.
Shush, Jeb! I think it's trying to communicate!
